Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to communications by mercantile establishments attempting to settle civil actions deriving from larceny prosecutions
Summary: Requires certain notices in communications by mercantile establishments attempting to settle civil actions deriving from larceny prosecutions.
LawCode: Add ยง349-h, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to communications by mercantile establishments attempting to settle civil actions deriving from larceny prosecutions
